categories: Category:Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2

nodes.text: Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 6

Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 6 is the sixth issue of the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 published by De Agostini. It came with the diagnostic display for the buildable R2-D2 and contained the articles "Filming R2-D2, Part 3", "EGL Power Droids" and "LCDS: Liquid Crystal Displays".
